workouts.name: Full body
workouts.description: Complete workout for all muscle groups

workouts.name: Upper body
workouts.description: Focus on arms, chest, and back

tips: Keep your lower back pressed to the floor
Move slowly and controlled
Breathe out as you extend opposite arm and leg
Keep hips stable and avoid rocking
Maintain a strong plank position
Tap shoulder lightly and return to starting position
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Lower your chest until elbows are at 90 degrees
Engage your core throughout the movement
Keep feet flat on the floor
Lower weights with control to chest level
Press up powerfully while maintaining form
Pull the bar to upper chest
Keep chest up and shoulders back
Control the weight on the way up
Keep back straight and core engaged
Pull weights to your sides
Squeeze shoulder blades together at the top
Keep core tight throughout
Press weights straight up
Don't arch your back excessively
Keep elbows at your sides
Control the weight down slowly
Don't swing or use momentum
Keep elbows close to your head
Extend fully at the top
Lower weight with control
Keep your weight on your heels
Push your knees out in line with your toes
Keep your chest up and back straight
Keep your body in a straight line
Don't let your hips sag or pike up
Breathe normally throughout the hold
Keep chest up and spine straight
Rotate from your core, not just arms
Keep feet elevated for more challenge
Hold each stretch for 20-30 seconds
Don't bounce while stretching
Breathe deeply and relax into the stretch
Keep weight on heels
Knees track over toes
Go as low as comfortable while maintaining form
Keep chest up and core braced
Drive through heels to stand
Maintain neutral spine throughout
Keep bar close to your body
Drive hips forward at the top
Keep back straight throughout movement
Push through heel of elevated foot
Keep torso upright
Control the descent
Drive through heels
Squeeze glutes at the top
Keep chin tucked
Keep core engaged for stability
Extend leg fully at the top
Control the movement speed
Keep chest up and back straight
Push hips back as you lunge
Keep the other leg straight
Keep core tight and hips level
Drive knees toward chest quickly
Maintain steady breathing rhythm
Bring elbow to opposite knee
Keep lower back pressed to floor
Don't pull on your neck
Keep legs as straight as possible
Walk hands out to plank position
Maintain tight core throughout
Keep lower back pressed to floor
Lower legs slowly with control
Don't let feet touch the ground between reps
